response.original_title: I Love Toy Trains The Final Show
response.overview: We open with a story about Richard Kughn, former owner of Lionel trains and creator of Carail, We tour the TM World Headquarters and see six different layouts. Youâ€™ll recognize some of them because many scenes in this series were shot on those layouts. We demonstrate how we built the Lionel OO and Marklin HO layout, show another incredible Lego layout plus a look back with Jeff. New songs by Jim Coffey include Come Ride With Me and Thanks Again.
response.title: I Love Toy Trains The Final Show
